text: Aurich (; East Frisian Low Saxon: Auerk, West Frisian: Auwerk, ) is a town in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is the capital of the district of Aurich and is the second largest City in East Frisia, both in population, after Emden, and in area, after Wittmund. ==Twin towns â€“ sister cities== Aurich is twinned with: * Appingedam, Netherlands ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official German list of concentration camps Record of the concentration camp and its sub-camps Category:Aurich (district) Category:Towns and villages in East Frisia
title: Aurich
